There's a broad array of cold remedies you might want to try, ranging from over-the-counter preparations to basic ingredients tucked away in your pantry. So what'll it be? A pain reliever and nasal decongestant? Vitamin C and echinacea? Tea with honey? A brimming bowl of chicken soup?
